page.title: 04URBAN CREEP AND SPRAWL
page.content: OUR CLASS OF CHILDREN WENT UP THE LANE BY{PRESTBURY SCHOOL}TO FIND OUT WHERE THE HOUSES FINISHED AND THE COUNTRYSIDE BEGAN. WE PASSED THE EDGE OF THE{CEMETERY}AND WE REACHED SOME NEW HOUSES WHERE MEN WERE BUILDING. BOVIS HOMES ARE BUILDING A{NEW {ESTATE}AND MOST OF THE HOUSES WE SAW HAD DOUBLE GLAZING AND PATIO DOORS. NEARBY, THERE IS A SMALL PARK WITH SWINGS AND A ROUNDABOUT. A{STREAM FLOWS BEHIND THE NEW HOUSES BRINGING WATER DOWN FROM CLEEVE HILL. IT WAS PARTLY BLOCKED BY WASTE METAL AND {RUBBISH,}INCLUDING CORRUGATED IRON SHEETS. A LITTLE FURTHER ON, WE SAW IN A BIG MUDDY FIELD SEVENTY COWS FROM LOWER NOVERTON FARM GOING TO BE MILKED.
